review: I got this product for my daughters room to stream some cartoons and what have you mainly from my plex media server. This definitely has some issues in terms of streaming capabilities. Your server needs to be plugged in via ethernet and you need a fairly high end router. I have a netgear ac1900 nighthawk and definitely couldn't stream 1080p without my laptop being plugged directly into my router. I also have a roku 3 which is really fast and has never had a slight streaming issue at all. But other than that the interface on this little thing is pretty good. No streaming issues in terms of netflix or anything. But if you intend to use plex a lot i would look elsewhere such as a roku 3.
